# [FEAT] Followers and CCs

## Labels
`collaboration`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement followers and CCs to keep stakeholders informed about ticket updates.

## Requirements

### CC Functionality
- Add CCs to tickets
- CC on initial submission
- Add CC during conversation
- CC receives email updates
- CC can reply

### Follower Functionality
- Internal followers (agents)
- Follow without email
- Notification preferences
- Bulk follow/unfollow
- Auto-follow rules

### CC Management
- View current CCs
- Add/remove CCs
- CC permissions
- CC visibility to requester
- CC reply handling

### Follower Features
- Follow button on tickets
- My followed tickets view
- Follower notifications
- Follower-only notes
- Unfollow option

### Notifications
- Configure what CCs receive
- Configure follower notifications
- Email templates for CCs
- Notification frequency

### Permissions
- Who can add CCs
- Who can see CCs
- Who can become followers
- Organization-based rules

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports adding CCs and followers to tickets to keep additional stakeholders informed about updates.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] CC functionality works
- [ ] Followers can track tickets
- [ ] Notifications configurable
- [ ] Reply from CC handled
- [ ] Permissions enforced
